TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_block
inventory=[{"type": "compass", "quantity": 16, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 9, "index": 21}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 27, "index": 23}, {"type": "pillager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 26}, {"type": "rabbit_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft a diamond block I need to place 9 diamonds in a 3x3 grid. I have 9 diamonds at slot 21. I will first move one diamond to slot 1 of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1
